title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.14.1 发布
author: 广药
txt_content:
本帖最后由 广药 于 2019-12-19 03:03 编辑 

Minecraft基岩版是指包括Minecraft手机版（Android、IOS）、Win10版（VR）、主机版（XboxOne、NS、PS4）在内，使用“基岩引擎”（C++语言）开发的Minecraft统一版本。
正式版是Minecraft基岩版经过一段时间的测试版测试之后得到的稳定版本，也是众多材质、Addon和官方领域服会逐渐跟进的版本。与此同时Google Play、Win10 Store等官方软件商店也会推送此次更新。
https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360037581632

Our developers have been buzzy bees getting top issues addressed for this hotfix. Several of these were even reported by players, so keep those reports coming at bugs.mojang.com! PlayStation 4 and Nintendo Switch have not yet received the update but will have it soon. This update is still multiplayer compatible with devices running version 1.14.0.
我们的开发人员像蜂了一样，一直在解决这此更新的几个重要问题。其中一些是被玩家提交的，所以请继续在bugs.mojang.com提交BUG！PlayStation4和NintendoSwitch平台还没有推送更新，但很快就会更的。本次的更新与1.14.0版本的多人游戏兼容。

Fixes:
漏洞修复（共21个BUG）
Crashes / Performance崩溃/性能
Fixed several crashes that occurred during gameplay, across all platforms修复了多个平台在游戏过程中发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that occurred when signing into Xbox Live on some Android devices修复了一些安卓设备在登陆Xbox Live时发生的崩溃问题Added a potential fix for a crash and user interface corruption that occurred after updating the game on Xbox One添加了一个在Xbox One上更新游戏后发生的崩溃和用户界面损坏潜在修复程序Improved performance in areas with high numbers of players提高了拥有大量玩家区域的性能Increased performance when loading skins on Featured Servers提高了在特色服务器上加载皮肤时的性能
General常规
Fixed some achievements and trophies unlocking for all players during a multiplayer session修复了在多人游戏中所有玩家的成就和奖杯都不会解锁的问题
Gameplay游戏
View bobbing once again behaves correctly when facing North and South (MCPE-56214)面向正南或正北时的视角摇动动画正常了 (MCPE-56214)
Mobs生物
Bees now become angry when baby bees are attacked当小蜜蜂被攻击时，蜜蜂会生气了Bees will now die after attacking (MCPE-53860)蜜蜂攻击后会死亡了 (MCPE-53860)Monsters no longer spawn on glass and leaves怪物不会再玻璃和树叶上生成了
Items物品
Fixed items disappearing when crafting several items (MCPE-56118)修复了合成多个物品时物品消失的问题 (MCPE-56118)Fixed some instances of milk randomly disappearing from buckets (MCPE-57194)修复了一些牛奶会从桶中随机消失的问题(MCPE-57194)
Character Creator角色创建器
Fixed some Character Creator items appearing incorrectly修复了一些角色创建器的物品显示不正确的问题Fixes to Character Creator screens when scrolling with the right thumbstick修复了色创建器界面使用右转图标时发生的问题
Graphical图形
Fixed broken textures appearing after Resource Packs are deactivated修复禁用材质包后材质仍不正常的问题
User Interface用户界面
Fixed the prompt that appears when split-screen guests attempt to join a multiplayer world without a Nintendo Switch Online subscription修复了没有订阅Nintendo Switch Online的分屏玩家加入多人游戏存档时出现的提示Fixed the Sign In button on the main menu having the wrong position and touching the edge of the screen with some languages修复了在使用部分语言时发生的主界面登录按钮错位并触及屏幕边缘的问题Fixed an issue that caused some players not to be able to leave the Inventory screen on the Marketplace修复一些玩家无法退出市场的个人物品界面的问题Fixed placeholder text appearing on the Resource Packs and Behavior Packs screens调整材质包和行为包界面的占位符文本位置Various fixes to the user interface when using Japanese language修复了在使用日语时的用户界面问题Fixed the Mario Skin Pack’s description never loading on Nintendo Switch修复了马力欧皮肤包的描述不在Nintendo Switch上载入的问题



正版地址Google Playhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpeWin10 Storehttps://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/store/p/minecraft-for-windows-10/9nblggh2jhxj
